item.title: Get the app apk from Android terminal
item.description: 1.Connect to Android terminal 2.adb shell pm list packages -f | grep $packagename 3.apk pull $packagename

item.title: Every day UI Automator
item.description:
UI testing framework. suitable for cross-app functional UI testing across system and installed apps. Attempt to seek new application design with UI Automator every day!

Android Studio -> Tools -> Android -> Android Device Monitor
